title.en: Aspiration for the Spread of the Teachings in Sumatra1

text.en: Through the blessings of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas of the ten directions
text.en-trans: chok chü gyalwa sé dang chepa dang

text.en: In this land to which the teachings that establish all beings in the state of lasting peace,
text.en-trans: dro kün ten gyi dewa la göpé

text.en: The uncommon Great Vehicle, the fine path to awakening,
Once spread—the Golden Isle of Sumatra,
text.en-trans: darwé suma tara ser ling dir

text.en: May the teachings of the Buddha in general and the path of Mind Training in particular
text.en-trans: tenpa chi dang lhakpar lojong lam

text.en: Flourish as a share of the merit of all the beings of this world,
text.en-trans: dzamling kyegü sönam go kal du

text.en: Just as they did before, and may everyone
text.en-trans: ngar zhin dargyé long su chöpa yi

text.en: Always enjoy such splendour and good fortune!
text.en-trans: kalzang pal la taktu rolpar shok
